Package millionaire.Model

Class ChangeQuestion

java.lang.Object
millionaire.Model.LifeLine
millionaire.Model.ChangeQuestion
class ChangeQuestion
extends LifeLine
This class represent Change Question life line and it extends LifeLine class. The only different between the other life lines and this one is isRunning member variable that ChangeQuestion have. Because of there is just one change question life line , Singleton design pattern is used.
Author:
Mohammad.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static ChangeQuestion instance
    It is the only instance of this class (singleton).
    private boolean isRunning
    It stores the status of the change question life line ( if is running will store true otherwise false).
    It's needed because the change question lifeline will affect the other life lines when is running (used).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private ChangeQuestion()
    It is a constructor method creates a ChangeQuestion object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) static ChangeQuestion getInstance()
    It returns change question life line object.
    (package private) boolean isRunning()
    It uses to know if changeQuestion life line is running
    (package private) void reset()
    It uses to reset change question life line.
    (package private) java.lang.String[] run()
    It is overriding LifeLine run method.
    (package private) void stop()
    It uses to make isRunning member variable equals to false.

    Methods inherited from class millionaire.Model.LifeLine

    getInstance, setBehavior

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      static ChangeQuestion getInstance()
      It returns change question life line object.
      Returns:
      the only possible instance of this class (singleton).

    • run

      java.lang.String[] run()
      It is overriding LifeLine run method.
      Overrides:
      run in class LifeLine
      Returns:
      string array that have the reserve question and its options.

    • isRunning

      boolean isRunning()
      It uses to know if changeQuestion life line is running
      Returns:
      boolean value of isRunning member variable that show if changeQuestion life line is running.

    • stop

      void stop()
      It uses to make isRunning member variable equals to false.

    • reset

      void reset()
      It uses to reset change question life line.
      Overrides:
      reset in class LifeLine
